job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>Master's Degree in Applied Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Statistics or related technical field</li><li>8-10&nbsp;years</li><li>Healthcare experience preferred.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills, Abilities, Experience</strong></p><ul><li>Advanced knowledge in data science tools (Python, R, Linux, etc.)</li><li>Advanced SQL skills (MS SQL Server, Snowflake, etc.)</li><li>Advanced Microsoft Excel knowledge</li><li>Proficiency in data visualization tools (Domo, Tableau, Power BI, etc.)</li><li>Effective communication skills</li><li>Forward-thinking, curious, creative</li><li>Able to lead people or projects</li><li>Aware of current marketplace trends</li><li>Able to collect and analyze complex information, problem solve and make decisions</li><li>Strong skills in inspiring the win-win-win</li><li>Able to work independently</li></ul><p></p>
